languages.text: "Значит, вы — Ревущие, яростные кровопийцы, ждущие смерти на арене? Это вам говорил Злоба?"
"So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, вы — Ревущие, яростные кровопийцы, ждущие смерти на арене? Это вам говорил Злоба?"

traits.locale_text: "So. You are the Shriekers, vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"
"So. You are the Shriekers, vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

"So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

languages.text: 「つまりお前たちはシュリーカーで、アリーナで死を待つ凶暴なプレデター。マリスがそう言ったのか？」
languages.original_text: "So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまりお前たちはシュリーカーで、アリーナで死を待つ凶暴なプレデター。マリスがそう言ったのか？」

languages.text: “也就是说，你们是尖啸者，是竞技场中邪恶的掠食者，等待光荣赴死的时刻。恶棍就是这么和你们说的吗？”
languages.original_text: "So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你们是尖啸者，是竞技场中邪恶的掠食者，等待光荣赴死的时刻。恶棍就是这么和你们说的吗？”

languages.text: «Así que sois los Aulladores, depredadores viciosos que esperan su muerte en la arena. ¿Es eso lo que Malicia os dijo?».
languages.original_text: "So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

traits.locale_text: «Así que sois los Aulladores, depredadores viciosos que esperan su muerte en la arena. ¿Es eso lo que Malicia os dijo?».

languages.text: "Also. Ihr seid die Kreischer, gnadenlose Kämpfer, die ihren Tod in der Arena erwarten. Hat Tücke Euch das erzählt?"
languages.original_text: "So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

traits.locale_text: "Also. Ihr seid die Kreischer, gnadenlose Kämpfer, die ihren Tod in der Arena erwarten. Hat Tücke Euch das erzählt?"

languages.text: « Vous êtes donc des Hurleurs, des prédateurs vicieux voués à mourir dans l'arène. C'est bien ce que Malice vous a dit ? »
languages.original_text: "So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes donc des Hurleurs, des prédateurs vicieux voués à mourir dans l'arène. C'est bien ce que Malice vous a dit ? »

languages.text: "Demek Çığırtkanlar sizsiniz. Melanet, size vahşi avcılar olarak arenada ölmeyi beklemenizi mi söyledi?"
languages.original_text: "So, you are the Shriekers, the vicious predators who await their death in the arena. Is that what Malice told you?"

traits.locale_text: "Demek Çığırtkanlar sizlersiniz. Melanet size, vahşi avcılar olarak arenada ölmeyi beklemenizi mi söyledi?"
